configurations.name: Zip and push the f*** to my phone!
configurations.command: winrar u -r -afzip ld.zip system module.prop README.md META-INF *.sh && sleep 1 && adb push ./ld.zip /sdcard/Download && adb shell su -c "ls /sys/bin/linuxdeploy" || adb shell su -c "magisk --install-module /sdcard/Download/ld.zip && reboot"
